trans-unit.source: Presents [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window.
trans-unit.target: Viser [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] innhold i en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Many members of this class are unavailable in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Mange medlemmer av denne klassen er utilgjengelig i sonen Internett sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: An HwndSource implements a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window that can contain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: En HwndSource implementerer en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] vindu som kan inneholde [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] innhold.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content in the window is arranged, measured, and rendered; and is interactive to input.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] innholdet i vinduet er ordnet målt, og gjengis; og interaktive inndata.

trans-unit.source: Because the HwndSource is specifically designed to interoperate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], this class exposes several low-level [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] features.
trans-unit.target: Fordi HwndSource er spesielt utviklet til sammen med [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], denne klassen viser flere lavt nivå [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to do the following: - Specify window styles, window class styles, and extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne klassen for å gjøre følgende: - Angi vindusstiler, vinduet klassen stiler, og utvidede vindusstiler.

trans-unit.source: - Hook the window procedure.
trans-unit.target: -Koble vinduet prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: - Provide access to the window handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: -Gir tilgang til vinduet håndtaket (HWND).

trans-unit.source: - Destroy the window.
trans-unit.target: -Fjerne vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The HwndSource class is designed for general interoperability and is not designed as a managed HWND wrapper.
trans-unit.target: Klassen HwndSource er utformet for generell interoperabilitet og er ikke laget som en administrert HWND tekstbryting.

trans-unit.source: In general, it does not provide managed methods for manipulating the window or properties for inspecting its state.
trans-unit.target: Det gir vanligvis ikke forvaltet metoder for å endre vinduet eller egenskaper for undersøker tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the HwndSource class provides access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window handle (HWND) through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A> property, which can be passed by means of PInvoke techniques to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in order to manipulate the window.
trans-unit.target: I stedet klassen HwndSource gir tilgang til den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet håndtaket (HWND) gjennom den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A>egenskap, som kan sendes ved hjelp av PInvoke teknikker til å [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] for å endre vinduet.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Construction** Many aspects of the HwndSource can only be specified at construction time.
trans-unit.target: **Konstruksjon** mange aspektene av HwndSource kan bare angis under bygging.

trans-unit.source: To create an HwndSource, first create an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure and populate it with the desired parameters.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en HwndSource, først opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>struktur og fylle den med de ønskede parameterne.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: These parameters include the following: - The class, window, and extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: Disse parametere er blant annet følgende:-klasse, Windows og utvidede vindusstiler.

trans-unit.source: You must use PInvoke to change the styles after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke PInvoke for å endre malene etter vinduet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Not all styles can be changed after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle stiler kan endres etter at vinduet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Consult the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentation before changing window styles.
trans-unit.target: Se den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] dokumentasjonen før du endrer vindusstiler.

trans-unit.source: - The initial position of the window.
trans-unit.target: -Første posisjonen i vinduet.

trans-unit.source: - The initial size of the window, which includes whether the size is specified or should be determined from the determined size of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: -Opprinnelig størrelse på vinduet, som inkluderer om størrelsen er angitt eller skal bestemmes fra fastslått størrelsen på den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] innhold.

trans-unit.source: - The parent window.
trans-unit.target: -Det overordnede vinduet.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook> to include in the window procedure chain.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook>Skal tas med i vinduet prosedyren kjeden.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a hook at construction time, it receives all messages for the window.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en binding under bygging, mottar alle meldinger i vinduet.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> to add a hook after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>å legge til en binding etter vinduet er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The transparency settings.
trans-unit.target: -Gjennomsiktighet innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: A top-level window can be configured to blend with the other windows on the desktop according to the per-pixel transparency of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Et vindu på øverste nivå kan konfigureres for å blande med andre windows skrivebordet i henhold til per pikselbredden gjennomsiktigheten for den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] innhold.

trans-unit.source: To enable this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere dette, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be specified at construction time, and only through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> constructor signature, and it imposes several limitations.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare angis under bygging og bare gjennom den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>konstruktørsignatur, og den vanlige flere begrensninger.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>

trans-unit.source: After you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure, pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> constructor for the HwndSource.
trans-unit.target: Når du fylle ut den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>struktur, sende den til den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>konstruktøren for HwndSource.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: **Object Lifetime** An HwndSource is a regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, and its lifetime is managed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: **Objektet levetid** en HwndSource er en vanlig [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] objekt og levetiden administreres av saneringsoppsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: Because the HwndSource represents an unmanaged resource, HwndSource implements <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi HwndSource representerer en ubehandlet ressurs, implementerer HwndSource <xref:System.IDisposable>.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Synchronously calling <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A> immediately destroys the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window if called from the owner thread.
trans-unit.target: Kaller synkront <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>umiddelbart ødelegger den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] Hvis kalles fra eieren-tråden.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: If called from another thread, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window is destroyed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kalles fra en annen tråd i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet ødelegges asynkront.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A> explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>eksplisitt fra interoperating koden kan være nødvendig for enkelte interoperation scenarioer.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Window Procedures** The HwndSource class implements its own window procedure.
trans-unit.target: **Vinduet prosedyrer** for HwndSource klassen implementerer sin egen vinduet prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: This window procedure is used to process important window messages, such as those related to layout, rendering, and input.
trans-unit.target: Dette vinduet brukes til å behandle viktige vindusmeldinger, for eksempel de som er relatert til oppsettet gjengivelse, som inndata.

trans-unit.source: However, you can also hook the window procedure for your own use.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid også koble vinduet prosedyren for bruk.

trans-unit.source: You can specify your own hook during construction by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, or you can also use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A> to add and remove hooks after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi din egen binding under konstruksjon ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, eller du kan også bruke <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A>legge til og fjerne bindinger etter vinduet er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The hooks are called by last-in first-out order, which enables your hooks to execute before the built-in processing.
trans-unit.target: Bindinger kalles av last inn First rekkefølge, slik at de bindinger til å kjøre før den innebygde behandlingen.

trans-unit.source: The actual hooks are held by a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: De faktiske bindinger holdes av en svak referanse.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that you manage the lifetime of your hook delegate.
trans-unit.target: Derfor må du kontrollere at du administrerer levetiden for representanten binding.

trans-unit.source: For more information about HwndSource and other interoperation classes, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om HwndSource og andre interoperation klasser [WPF og Win32 bruken](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Notice how the constructors for HwndSource take parameters that resemble the parameters for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] functions such as [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462).
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til hvordan konstruktører for HwndSource ta parametere som ligner på parameterne for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] fungerer som [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462).

trans-unit.source: Scale transformations should not be applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A> of an HwndSource.
trans-unit.target: Skalaen transformasjoner bør ikke brukes på den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>av en HwndSource.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se merknader for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> class by using a structure that contains the initial settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av en struktur som inneholder de opprinnelige innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This method is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Denne metoden er ikke tilgjengelig i sonen Internett sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor signature might be more convenient in certain situations, because the default structure contains some appropriate initial default values.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren signaturen kanskje mer praktisk i enkelte situasjoner fordi standardstrukturen inneholder riktige første standardverdier.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If you use this signature, do not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor to construct the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure for the `parameters` value.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Hvis du bruker denne signaturen, ikke bruker standard <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>konstruktøren for å konstruere den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>struktur den `parameters` verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor that enables you to specify an initial window name.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>konstruktøren som gjør det mulig å angi navnet på en første vinduet.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor and create an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> with it, that <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> does not display because an initial window name is a construction requirement for the represented HWND.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker standard <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>konstruktøren og opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>med det som <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>vises ikke fordi det første vinduet-navnet er et konstruksjon krav for representeres HWND.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: A structure that contains the parameters that are required to create the window.
trans-unit.target: En struktur som inneholder parametere som kreves for å opprette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> class with a specified class style, style, extended style, x-y position, name, and parent window.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> klassen med en angitt klasse stil, stil utvidet stil, x-y-posisjon, navn og overordnet vindu.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This method is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Denne metoden er ikke tilgjengelig i sonen Internett sikkerhet.
